The U: N. refugee agency emphasizes that individuals fleeing persecution and violence have the right to seek asylum and benefit from international protection, but it does not weigh in on whether it is legal for a country to close its borders to refugees and asylum seekers.
The claim originated from a right: wing website, Breitbart.com, which inaccurately reported that the U.N. Refugee Agency had "commanded" President Trump to accept the caravan of refugees.
